input_data.prompt_to_llm:
The following financial transaction passed all fraud checks and no unusual patterns were detected. Please generate a concise (2-3 sentences) and reassuring narrative explaining this. Do not include a conversational opening or closing. Focus on clarity and professionalism.

Transaction details: ID ea0727d9-4b12-4432-99f0-372f3a12fc7e, Amount $150.00, Card Type credit, User Location USA, Merchant Amazon, Merchant Location USA.

description: The financial transaction ID ea0727d9-4b12-4432-99f0-372f3a12fc7e has been thoroughly reviewed and cleared of any suspicious activity. The transaction amount of $150.00 was processed through a reputable credit card, originating from a valid user location in the USA, and was made to a trusted merchant, Amazon, also located in the USA.
